3553inline error_t net_post_get(int rank_in, void* buffer_in, size_t size_in, mr_t mr_in, uint64_t offset_in, rmr_t rmr_in) {
3554 return net_post_get_x(rank_in, buffer_in, size_in, mr_in, offset_in, rmr_in).call();
3555}
